text: Mbere yabo (Abakurayishi), n’abantu ba Nuhu ndetse n’udutsiko twaje nyuma yabo barahakanye. Kandi buri muryango w’abantu washakaga kwica intumwa yawutumweho, ndetse bajya impaka zishingiye ku kinyoma bagamije kuburizamo ukuri, maze ndabafata (ndabahana). Mbega uko ibihano byanjye byari bimeze
